title: Christmas presence
creator_credit: Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television, AFI [au] and Glen Whelan
brief_description: A story about family estrangement and father son relationships. A dying man makes contact with his son after twenty years. His son, struggling with his own role as a father invites him to Christmas lunch.
